amendment.description: Amendment sought to add $30 million to the salaries and expenses account of the General Accounting Office for the development of Scientific and Technology Assessment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 108-590 to add $30 million to the salaries and expense account of the U.S. General Accounting Office (GAO) to establish within GAO a Center for Science and Technology Assessment; to rReduce by $15 million the general administration account from the Architect of the Capitol; and to reduce by $15 million the congressional printing and binding account of the Government Printing Office.
